lines.text: (pained noises) You see it squeal out as you slowly saw your way into its body until it lies still once more, robbing it of its second death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manners!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ball retracts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he was doing that, I want to stealth away with my brother for a moment and say, I'm sorry. About everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away did you just pull me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Far enough that nobody can hear us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus Christ. Ten. God damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull him off, you get three steps from the building before (crash) a heavy, iron bear trap snaps onto your leg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you, Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The words were uttered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of piercing damage and you are currently grappled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I deserved that. That's karma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get it off your foot. I'll help her pull it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Between the two of you, it takes you a moment, but you manage to peel it off. The wounds aren't too bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're fine. Your boot's ripped up. All right, watch your step. Come on. Past it all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to not move, though, because I don't want to step on another one of those fucking things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While Keyleth chuckles about that a little bit, I'm going to look around and find a little piece to remember Sprigg by from his house to take with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check through the books to see if there's anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'll help him check the books once I've grabbed something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, each of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yours is much better than mine. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. You find some elements of partially charred pipes, some small statues that were destroyed in the recent battle. You find some unkept plants that were plotted and then left to dry out. There are many things here that you could take if you wanted to have memory of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this rusty bolt represent Sprigg?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I think that may have actually come with us, that might have been us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll regrow this plant later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sprigg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you search through books, you pull Vax off to the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask you a question?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've seen it coming for a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's getting the better end of the bargain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think so, too. I didn't plan it. If I had, I would have told you. And then when I saw you, it seemed like bad timing to say anything, and then things kept happening. (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Stubby, I spent so many years standing at your side. I guess I thought on

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody was standing at our side, except for each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, under ordinary circumstances, I would be giving you quite an earful, but there's nothing ordinary about any of this. I don't have time to be upset at my oldest friend. I just don't have time. So I love you. And I'm happy for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want you to go. I love you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know I love you. Would you do me one favor? When I'm gone-- I don't know, we could be dead tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could. I could die before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's probably going to outlast you, but while you're around, keep her company for me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she ever talks to me again, I swear I will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what you've got going for you is you look a lot like me. You can remind her of me once in a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey. It's okay. Happy for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Watch out for bear traps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've traced your path back, you manage to avoid the traps easily this time being far more aware of the surroundings. In the meantime, while you two are rummaging through the household.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're looking through the books, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Looking through books.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think we'll ever have gods in our lives?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're allowed that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) Me neither.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My books are still lovely, the library is still lovely. It made a lot of things better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I felt really guilty about it for a while, like something was wrong with me? I don't understand why I didn't feel it, why I didn't understand. I don't think it was until Sarenrae and even Ioun just now mentioned that we serve that balance and that non-believers are necessary. It made me feel like a little bit less of a fuck-up, I guess, in this whole situation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you're just fine. (laughs) Mostly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently, you're a madman.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A god called you a madman.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Honestly, I'm a little touched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's kind of a compliment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, by the way. You may be the only one who understands this, but I needed something that was mine for a little while. So little of who we are is ours, and I knew it would end, but it was nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ioun is quite a goddess, and she does not respect secrets, though. I, on the other hand, feel that secrets can be precious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently. I just don't understand why you were still enigmatic after you already told us in front of Pelor. It's kind of a slap in the face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I thought she may kill me at that point. I was honestly fearing for my life there a little bit, and at that point everything was so awkward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wanting something to be mine that I won't have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we'll see. I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some things you don't get to keep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, one of the bonuses of not being one of the chosen of the gods is we don't have to believe in destiny. We just, I think, heard a big speech from a god about not believing in destiny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I followed destiny my whole life. It wasn't until I got to the end that I realized the whole thing was ironic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do we have to listen to anything they say?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Cheers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cheers to the faithless. I kind of inhaled a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a plant. You've been holding a plant and I've been holding a book. That got weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't even know where we got these glasses in the story.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that was legitimately you were still holding a potted plant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. (spluttering) This coffee's been there for a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crudite? Crudite? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How does it feel to be chosen by a goddess at this point?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you! I know you've been listening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I pull Scanlan aside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all watch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A moment alone, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My cube?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the seed. The little bean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to see it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it squishy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't you do this before with the other one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't you try to squish it or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the grain of sand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Over here. (sniffs) What does it smell like? (deep inhale) What does it smell like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a seed of power, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't fucking rob me of my discovery. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can make out, it smells like dusty tomes. It smells like old, forgotten papers and parchment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smells like old money. It's been tucked in that old boob crevice. I want you to swallow the bean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Swallow the bean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think about Sprigg, right? His tummy was glowing like fucking Teddy Ruxpin. I want to see you swallow that shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. All right, I will mime swallowing the bean while I Wrist Pocket it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my god! What, are you crazy? I was only kidding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all watch as he takes the small essence stone and whispers under his breath a small incantation and flicks his fingers, then it vanishes, and he goes-- it's so overt, yet you are entranced. He swallowed that thing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope you know what you're doing. Do we get time with you before you leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I trust you 100 percent, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's gone! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where did that pencil go?! I pick Scanlan up by the scruff of his neck, and I hold my ear to his tummy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My stomach exists.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You hear the occasional (grumbling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. It's growing. Tell me your last rites before you burst, if it happens.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I leave all of my worldly possessions to you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Write that down, somebody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got it, Grog. I've got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm holding him up like a seashell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shake him a bit. It will stop the reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop manhandling Scanlan!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he doesn't like it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you not like it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I pass it, I'll retrieve the item.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's keeping it secret. Keeping it safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You lost me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We probably need to hurry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not go to Whitestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like we're being watched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Vasselheim?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did they know we were here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why didn't we ask Ioun about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you just kill the assassin guy that we were going to ask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was an undead thing. It was just going to make a tongue at us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He wasn't really going to offer information, anyway."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who the fuck are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's Vecna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the imp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Welcome back. You must have traveled quite a distance to be far from my sight."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he see-through? I try to shoot an arrow at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cocked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's not cocked. Cocked! 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29. (whoosh) It passes through his body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fucking knew it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He laughs for a second, and you see him smiling his terrible grin across curled, yellowed teeth. You see that flicker of green energy sparking in his left eye. It seems to pulse as his brow arches above it. "I admire your resolve. You did it. You solved the riddle. You found my home, "ruined my tower, slew one of my greatest acolytes, and even then, you failed. Still, impressive. That "is most definitely worthy of a fine round of applause."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're the only ones to get away. Others found me "before you did, and another group of supposed heroes came and assaulted me shortly after you "vanished. No matter. They all failed. And rose again."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight. Is he fucking lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check? Go for it, if you want to make one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was it? Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks for double-checking. It is. Like I would lie about a natural fucking 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a six. She's lying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the god of secrets! What do you expect?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The pencils are adorable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They are so cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, guys? I didn't know that this was ever a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't know we were making pencils? Don't you remember the holy Vox Machina text thread?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We definitely sent them in the text thread.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've thrown out so many cool ideas on that text thread.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When I say, hey, name your quote on the text thread, then you send in a quote, that means it's probably pretty solid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get asked for personal quotes all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would recommend you not waste such a rare lease "on your arrogant lives."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk right up to him while he's talking and inspect his ugly fucking face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see through his beautifully adorned crushed velvet robes with gold trim. You see the tattered edges where gems and baubles hang around his neck. You can see the tendons and muscle that are pulled taut against his skin, that is drawn against his nearly-skeletal frame. He smiles back at you, looking down from that one sickly, almost pale blue iris and that green glowing burst of energy where his other eye would be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's that eye socket doing, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My vision sees far more than it once did."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he's rambling, can Keyleth be looking for the nearest big-ass tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. There's plenty of big-ass trees in your area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Booby traps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any clear path of least resistance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look at all these big-ass trees.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, is there anybody in the forest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's plenty to see, and you don't see anybody else nearby in the forest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Path of least resistance without traps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see a path you can take.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not entirely certain I am mortal anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know what you are, and I know you know where I am. Come to me whenever you like."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, fuckstick, we are coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am the Tyrant Unmatched."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you're very grand. And I begin to fingerfuck his eyehole in the illusion. So majestic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as your finger goes forward, his image flickers out and appears in the same room, behind you, now right up against Percy and Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can see your every move. I know your plot. I "know your destination. I know your plan, your capabilities, your allies, and your imminent "demise, should you continue. I offer you the chance to stand down, discard your imprisoned "gods, and pledge to me. Many you love will. Many you love already have."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I love it when they come begging for a truce. That means he's scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is it more important to throw away your lives against an unstoppable god or to return to "your families--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, I think you're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you persist, I will not only destroy you, I will erase the memory of you ever existing "from the mind of anyone you've ever known or cared for."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think you have that power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then try me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get out of here now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I only serve gods with big dicks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Enjoy the forge."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I point out the path. That way! Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the portal opens and you guys go darting off in that direction, you hear in the distance the (cackles). One after another, you all jump through the portal, emerging?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In Vasselheim. (poof noise) All of you dart out just as the dusk sun begins to hit on the distant mountains this far across the ocean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look around. Is there Vecna anywhere to be seen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nowhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need sanctuary. Can you make your mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to rest, eventually, and you need to commune. We'd better assume we're being seen and heard at all times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if he can see us in your dimension?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said, of Exandria.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said he couldn't see us when we were in the library.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where do I feel him now? Same distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same distance. Same place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You need to talk. There's much to do, and this does not feel good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to Raven Queen's temple right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Raven Queen or the mansion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can do the mansion outside of her temple?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or even inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vasselheim doesn't take very kindly to magic stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be in her temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aren't you also wanted here, right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will literally shoot anybody who attempts to deal with it. Give him your hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first thing you guys notice as you take in your surroundings: even though dusk is happening, there seems to be a larger bustle than you're used to in Vasselheim. You begin to see there's a skyship at port, and a lot of the various Bastions-- the general Bastions, the volunteer army that run across much of the city-- you see them darting back and forth, carrying supplies. There's a buzzing energy to the air of the city that you haven't seen in a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to grab someone, at some point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did tell the Ashari to start alerting the nearby towns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab a gentleman who runs past you, he has a greying beard with patches of black still, his top of his head is shaved bald and you can see a bit of a tattoo across one half of his face that curls into his ear. He's rushing with a cluster of spears under one arm, and he's wearing hide armor on his chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You there! What is the commotion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently, we're gearing up for some sort of assault."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How soon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We don't know. We've just been told to prepare."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who told?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to find out where it came from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The chain of command from the top of the Bastions, as well. Apparently, from some of the "other temples here are speaking of some entity, some Vecna."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good man. Carry on. Prepare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bet whenever he ascended, all the clerics felt it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be fighting undead, more than likely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." He goes to run off, two of his compatriots stop and turn and give a slow glance of recognition towards Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep running. They've got bigger things happening right now, just keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you get the sense that at least word of someone matching your image has been disseminated throughout the town.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am quite famous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to disguise you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, why not. What am I looking like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take this hat--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to attune to it; it takes forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck! All right, I'll cast Seeming on you. On all of us. Because I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you make me look like Tary?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not smart!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's not like he was in the room where it happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The room where it happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room where it happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep running toward the Raven Queen temple as that's happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should probably try and use our words as much as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Black clothes, blue face, bald.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, where are you guys charging off to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Raven Queen temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You make your way to the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to keep looking around, make sure no one's tailing us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit of snow appears to have melted into slush at the corners, but most of it has been pushed off the main roads to the side. You see dirty snow matted at the edges. You follow Vax very quickly through the streets, and you see a few of the veiled maidens of the Raven's Crest aerie taking note of you. And as you approach, they just point over to the Raven's Crest silently as you walk past.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quickly. Quickly walk past.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk up the steps and push open the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're coming from the other side as opposed to the main entrance so you rush past the hall that goes, which is the Grand Library that's attached to the Raven's Crest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody's with me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, And you come to the front doors, they are closed currently, but you have two of the maidens there at the front, and as you begin to turn from the side, they glance over and give notice, and then turn and push the doors open in preparation. With that, you all enter Raven's Crest itself, and looking within, you can see the beautiful interior of carved obsidians and gold trims and sigils that are marked and pushed throughout the interior of this structure. Are you leading them to the central chamber?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm bringing everybody with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No one stops you, and as you head up these stairs into the second chamber and then finally to the large set of doorways that lead you into the central communion chamber of Raven's Crest, you guys enter to this beautiful room that is surrounded in stained glass imagery of varying colors, largely in dark purples and reds, blues, and in the center you see a large, circular pool where a deep crimson liquid sits perfectly still, familiar to both Percival and Vax'ildan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk over to Keyleth. We need to talk. And I plant a big fucking kiss on her mouth, and then I turn to the rest of the group and say, nobody fucking touches me, do you understand?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk in, and I inhale as deeply as I can as I shove my face into the blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold Trinket back so that he doesn't go after him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I watch on the side and don't take my eyes off of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you watch Vax just (bloop noise) disappear into this thick liquid, no bubbles rise, you see a bit of movement from thrashing beneath the surface and then stillness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this what he goes through every time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is normal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he a vampire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is not a vampire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's dead. I think he died in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that's how it works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I do think he's dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's undead, isn't he? He's a zombie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not a zombie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His flesh is cold, but his heart still beats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You burn with intent, my feathered boy."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then talk we shall. Speak your mind." You still see nothing around you, it's just the voice from the darkness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were too late to stop him. Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I sensed it, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This dead man who wanted to be a god is now a fucking god. We have been speaking to your brothers and sisters, your

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The weave is tangled before us. The threads grow knotted, hard to follow. But yours still glows so "bright into that terrible knot."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing. This man is your enemy, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As he is the enemy of all things."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Agreed. I have come here seeking power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have my blessing already."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What of these trammels? These fragments of divinity. Have you that in you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know much of these trammels but that they were used. But I fear that is beyond my "knowledge. The Knowing Mistress would be the one to speak to."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then what do you need of me?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to power trammels. The Dawnfather, the Knowing Mistress have contributed to our cause, to your cause, these seeds of power. I had hoped you could offer the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you feel a finger trace across your chin from behind. You feel an arm, the weight resting on your shoulder, and it pulls and turns you around, and as you spin, you come face to face with the porcelain mask you are so familiar with. As the hand still holds the edge of your cheek and your shoulder, "Am I to believe that this is not some ploy to diminish my power "and leave me vulnerable to cast me from my seat?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you knew me inside and out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why would they not think to strike at two birds "with one stone?" At which point, you watch the feathers of her dress furl out a bit, like a bird that's hit a chill.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it depends on you, then, and how much you want this wretch taken down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And all I ask is you put all your faith in me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I shall watch your thread. Now wake up." In that instant, everything goes black once more, and you feel the pain, the heat in your lungs, but then it subsides quickly, and you stay there beneath the familiar, thick surface of the blood. No need for air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're just chilling like a villain under the blood?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) He can breathe blood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The instinct to breathe is still there, but you realize after a moment of panic that it's not necessary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have what I came for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your muscles are still tense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll move up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, after waiting for about 30 minutes, it feels like, of tense silence, you watch as the surface of the pool (splashing) splashes upwards as a crimson Vax comes to the surface. Not gasping for breath. Just stoic, as he comes to the edge of the pool, step after step, dripping the blood with each footprint on the ground. Your fist hurts a bit from the tightness, but as you unfurl your fingers you look down and see a small, onyx opal. It's a stone about the size of a gem that big on your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a big bean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need a bath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to try and make one more jump?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a minute. I have a question. How many times have you done that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My gods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean... wow, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Campaign in 48 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. I could've just been chilling...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've made some bad decisions, haven't you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just stand clutching a gem dripping blood, looking at the love of my life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, you kiss your bear on the mouth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like Keyleth had some barbecue and wasn't paying attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know where that blood's from!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's love, y'all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was not expecting that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, all right, let's clean you up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to try and run one more time before we--

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Run where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, into the forge, I suppose. Find the sword, head to the forge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get to the forge? There's no trees there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a thought, right? Do we give a shit about Kord at all, or no?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would be great to have a fourth bean, but we're on a ticking time clock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I like the idea of the Kord bean, but I really want to go to bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's set up camp, and if you feel like you want to make one last--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll ask. He might just say no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't even know where to find him, though. We're running out of time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might as well see what's up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blockbuster?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Redbox, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Blockbuster. Where are you from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Errol's Video.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20/20. Do we want to set up shop here or do we want to set up shop in the temple of Kord?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think here. I feel like we're safe here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we got free reign. We got backstage passes. Everybody's like, "right through here!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think honestly here they'll have difficulty identifying which of our blood is going to be splattered on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm good with management, I think we can... yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's sleep here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you seem to be super tight with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to head over to Kord's temple as well? I have a feeling if we find him, we'll have to go to another plane.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that was my (stammers) assess, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you want to go do a little bit of footwork and see what it might take to get there, I can rest and try and get us there. Remember, you have to find a tuning fork, though, that is attuned to the specific plane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're speaking words that he doesn't--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You need a magical vibrating fork that is connected to the vibrating plane of Kord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't know what that word means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was just going to go speak to Earthbreaker Groon. I don't know what's so hard about that. He gave me these gloves last time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go. I'll go with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I still blue?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're still blue, and you still look like Blue Man Group, so do you want me to go with you so that I can undo that when we get there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you tweedles want to come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or do you want to talk to him blue?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I want to be blue. Yeah. I want to stay blue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But when you talk to Groon do you want to be blue?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah you can dissipate, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'll come with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. That cool?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys rest. I'm going to go find us a bean of strength and might and sex appeal. Can I go to the temple of Kord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You guys make your way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I making a mansion for the rest of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be smart. I feel like the mansion is the smartest thing because it's not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't have Raven Queen cots or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know; Vecna could still see in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's true. You're right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Mansion. Enjoy yourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You create the shimmering doorway, and you guys come into the mansion without issue.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: To the spa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll don the hat so I turn into the Meat Man so that no one can recognize me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The three of you make your way to the Braving Grounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're walking, I want to whisper to Scanlan. I'm going to whisper to the Meat Man's crotch because that's about even, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's a little bigger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'll whisper to his waistline. The sword that Ioun was talking about, right, the Sword of Kas?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Meat Man voice) The Sword of Kas, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it could possibly the sword that Grog had?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The thought did occur to me, yes, but there are big differences.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know for sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Ioun did not talk about a talking sword, for one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, but she didn't say it wasn't a talking sword. She said it was a vengeful sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think we should go get it to make sure? We should have asked for some sort of identifying feature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We really should have. Maybe we could ask the sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said, "Do you have any more questions?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we didn't. But maybe if we see that sword, we can be like, "Hey, do you know who Kas is?" and if he does, then we're like, "Oh fuck!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to go visit Craven Edge?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm saying this quietly. I don't want Grog to realize we're doing this. He has a thing for Craven Edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I held the sword once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a thing for Craven Edge, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck. Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence roll, actually. Roll a d20, add your intelligence modifier plus one because you have a permanent plus two to your intelligence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence check? 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't forget your Ioun papers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight plus two, plus one is 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, continue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Continue. You didn't pass the test.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, do I get to add my Jack of All Trades?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Plus three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. Continue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a very powerful sword, but perhaps it's worth a check. How do we get there? We'll have to talk to Keyleth about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think the timelines match. But I could be wrong. I'm not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Delilah Briarwood, Lord Briarwood had the sword, they were seeking Vecna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's where they got that shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could work out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they were making out like Vecna had this sword while we had Craven Edge, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna doesn't have the sword right now--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one's seen the Sword of Kas since Vecna was destroyed along with Kas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly! Craven Edge could be the Sword of Kas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It got lost and was refound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the Briarwoods. They were going to awaken him, but then he died.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it's just a sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or it's just a sword that just likes blood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to do something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we go?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're doing this while we walk. We're not wasting time with this conversation. We're traveling with this conversation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't realize.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll ask Keyleth when we get back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We sent it to the plane of the Dread Emperor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She knows how to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way through the Proving Grounds. Where are you heading to specifically?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Trial Forge with the big doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the Trial Forge. The doors are currently closed, it is mid-evening at this point. It's probably, at this point, with the communion and you guys making your way across the city? Yeah, it's close to midnight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. (loud knocking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 20 seconds later (door opening) begin to open. You hear the cinching of chains as the doors are pulled open ever so slightly. One of the monks of Kord arrives at the front, sees you, recognizes you with a bit of glance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's blue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Does not recognize you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I apologize for the late flower. Don't be confused. It's me, Grog Strongjaw, wielder of the Titanstone Knuckles. (whispers) I'm in-cog-Cheeto.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will drop the form of Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. "Very well. Can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I seek an audience with Earthbreaker Groon. Very important. It pertains to the emergence of Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. This may coordinate with his current effort. Very well. Please enter."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we come in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am a legitimate businessman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am very curious as to why you are here, then."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For business dealings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You walk with Vox Machina."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk through the halls, your footfalls echoing across the stone floor. The large archways and the pillars. It is very quiet. As you approach the edge of the central sandpit, in the center you see Groon, currently sitting in meditation with something drawn in the sand with a finger. Some sort of a sketch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May I approach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The head, facing away from you, picks up a bit. "You may."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (jumping and landing) Three-point stance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What brings you to the temple at this hour?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have urgent business-- what are you drawing there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Finish your statement."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vecna is at large, and we mean to take him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Awaiting orders. I'm trying to meditate on where this danger is."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a theory. We think he might be originating in Wildemount? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know where he is exactly-- (stammering) We've been speaking to the gods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You might want to talk through me. I'm his most prized pupil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand next to Grog while I say this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the sandpit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm going to fly down to the sandpit and land next to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lady Vex'ahlia. Great fighter, very brave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still hasn't turned around, but seems to be listening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hopefully not alone, but we need to speak with Kord. I know that sounds odd, but Grog was hoping--

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: I was hoping that you would know how to contact him directly, perhaps maybe have something that was tuned to his plane of existence, potentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Piety, meditation, and learning of the history of "the Storm Lord himself. But it can be done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long of a process is this, that we're talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You cannot rush faith."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not trying to rush faith. I'm just saying that Vecna has ascended to godhood. We have a limited amount of time to take him down. We need to speak with Kord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I cannot help you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't speak to him directly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can meditate and reach out, perhaps."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe draw his attention to us? The need is dire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It doesn't work the way you ask. Kord isn't a giving god."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold up. 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You know about Kord. Kord, from what you understand, is the god of competition and storms and chaotic nature and good-neutral territory, but emphasizes contest and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Self-reliance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's not the kind of god you can beseech with a word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can tell him there's a big fight coming. Call out to him! Get his attention.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See if he wants box seats or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Say he can help take down the big bad guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Free food and drinks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely! Prime tickets to a UFC fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you happen to know, from all your years of meditation, what plane or where Kord might reside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ysgard."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ysgard?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: East guard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ysgard."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is god. East guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) Ysgard. Hmm. Is that on another plane?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that near the Fields of Elysium, or a totally different place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, he is very busy right now with his meditation garden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, yeah. So you have nothing else that you can do? I know that you're going to fight his troops, but the fact of the matter is Vecna is a god. If we can't find some way to speak to Kord, we may not be able to save the world again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Action now would prevent the spread of his power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If what you say is true, I'm certain Kord already knows. We will do what we can, but what "you ask is not within our ability to grant."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. You don't happen to have a bean on you, do you? Hard no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Powerful beans. Super.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the first time, you see Kord glance over his shoulder at you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) He hasn't looked at us this whole fucking time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (running noises) Jumps down into the sand pit, runs up, and hands you a small satchel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have everything you've ever wanted, Grog. Congratulations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody else got

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see what he was drawing in the sand while we were over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it, too, because I was curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over and you see one sketch that appears to be a general overview of the city, of all the different quarters that make up the mountain. And he's essentially trying to work out defense positions within the city and preparing for some sort of siege.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thank you for seeing us at this late hour, and I wish you luck in the defense of this temple and this city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish I could be of more help."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have been.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Groon, if Vecna attacks here, he'll bring undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right. We'll bring the storm."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck! That was a noble answer! I'm sorry. I'm cool. We're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clicks tongue)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) He turns back to facing away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really creepy, isn't he?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make sure as we leave, we back away. Back away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What was Kord painting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He was drawing in the sand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sits back down in the sand pit and goes back to his concentration, leaves you to your business.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a total win. I got a bag full of beans.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. And we know that Kord is on "he's-a-god."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. He's in Ysgard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're saying it weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "He's-god."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "He's-god." So should I change back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean? You can't?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I could do it one more time, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going back to sleep, right? It's either that or I put a fancy robe over my whole face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This time, I make us all blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely. Can I have light blue hair?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dark blue skin, light blue hair? Sure. I'll be opposite.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not painted bald caps? Not blue-painted bald caps?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want beautiful hair. I've always wanted blue hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not the Blue Man Group I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We make our way back to the temples. Is the bustle the same outside of the temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as you step out of the temple and Scanlan blues you all, you make your way across--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The multiple blue jobs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's interesting. You see wyverns in the sky. You hear the familiar cries of wyverns, and at first, it catches you off-guard. But Vex'ahlia, glancing up, you can see they all have some sort of barding on them. Silver and blue barding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! It's the temple of Bahamut? Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Platinum dragons. They have wyvern riders here that act as air patrol during times of intense possible warfare.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Air force got scrambled. (aircraft noises) Amazing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Formation. Smoke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really hope Vasselheim stands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back to Raven's Crest, to the entranceway to Scanlan's Magnificent Mansion and to the rest of your party, freshly washed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So a question: what's on the menu?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Beans, apparently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, look. How do you even know that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just assumed because I know you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you only serve beans? There's no meat or fish?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's vegan here. We serve a lot of beans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because of your daughter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, she's not here. Can we make an exception?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's always here in my heart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hopefully not in the kitchen, though, so we're going to cook anything we like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got what we needed. I got myself a bean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got a shard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got several shards. I got a bag full of shards. Hold on, the power might bowl you all over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That actually might, especially if not eaten with rice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing? (gasping)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right; I can eat anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tastes like ash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so does everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. We can have coal bean soup all the time at home, you guys. These are coal beans. They're great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These are not the same thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There could be an actual seed of power within there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a table nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're not too far from the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I dump all the beans out on the table. Are there any beans that look different from the rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to help look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) 16. Does that count?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually find four beans that look a bit darker, but squishier. They look to maybe be a little on the the rotten side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These are the beans. I mean, I should've thought-- Kord is a fist, and you put one of each four on the knuckles. I squish each one of the beans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they squish easy. (squishing noise)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a little juice running down your gauntlet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they glowing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fermented? Fermented.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little funky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? I bet if I pray hard enough, they will disappear. Look above you!

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (noises of surprise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight-of-hand check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! That's not terrible. (laughing) I got plus two! 18! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, Scanlan and Pike are impressed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just rolled a two. Whoa. That was impressive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super tight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth goes behind Grog and starts cleaning up the beans that he just threw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike! Pretty good, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Honestly? Kind of blown away."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. Maybe I should get a tattoo for Kord, like the symbols you have for Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What're you thinking for the tattoo?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. A fist?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a bean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, don't put ideas in my head. A bean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Actually, the symbol of the Storm Lord's cool. I'll get it up for you." And she pulls out a piece of paper and sketches it up for you. It's this cool disc, this dark metal disc with blue bolts of lightning that stick out of the center.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Storm Lord symbol is the jam. That is a cartoon bean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a bean with a dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dick is smaller than the balls. It's like a parrot's beak. Listen. We're going to stick with the Storm Lord sigil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are going to save the world.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's in a place called--

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Ysgard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you familiar?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Why'd you say sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just seeming intelligent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do that all the time. Anybody have any idea where that is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. We can ask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Who can we ask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Asking the dungeon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) Make a religion check, only if you're trained in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm making a religion check. Jeepers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just rolled for Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17, but I'm not trained in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a 12.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not trained in religion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) Not a whole lot of information gleaned on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) Okay. How did Pike roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike didn't roll that great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy? With your migraine, do you know what else we need to make these trammels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been thinking a lot. I've been trying to skirt around this information for a bunch of reasons, so I've been making a mental shopping list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And from what you recall, it seems that one, the tools that were used to build them are generally with the anvil forge. It's more the essence of the god that drives the trammel. The material required is pure platinum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Platinum mines!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that we buried under a mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So? We know where they are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we for sure need platinum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The trammels are about that long. They're giant stakes of platinum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need more platinum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm attempting to do the math of how much platinum...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you were to melt down platinum pieces? Each trammel would probably be close to I'd say-- with the density and the thickness of it-- 500 platinum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Each trammel is 500 platinum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. For the thickness of it, for the pure platinum structure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much do we have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I didn't write exactly how much platinum we have. I transposed the platinum into gold in my notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can buy platinum. Go to a bank and exchange it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can exchange gold for platinum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, Grog. You had it in your original Bag of Holding? How much was written down on our original Bag of Holding list?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. There were a bunch of digits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you not still have it written down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he actually has the phrase "a bunch of digits," that would make me so happy right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, we could always take Kima's greatsword. It's made out of solid platinum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has that sword right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she does. I'm just saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who was the other band of travelers who fought and lost?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 1,600 platinum.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had 1,600 platinum, originally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's part of me that doesn't want to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could go to the bank here in Vasselheim and switch out money for platinum. We have enough gold to do. It's 500 platinum each, you said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a place where we could buy bars?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 5,000 gold would be 500 platinum? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to melt it down to get rid of the impurities to get the metal down to its purest form. There's a process to it that you are actually familiar with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm familiar with it, all of a sudden. So because we have these shards, right, these magical beans, if we lose, do we effectively kill all the gods whose shards we have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We depower them, so they'll be weak when they go against Vecna.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's a lot of responsibility I was not aware of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we need to not lose. They're still diminished if we do defeat Vecna. That part of them is forever chaining him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we fail, he could be coming after them. They have no line of defense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Worst scenario possible. Cool. Good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it prevents them from intervening directly on his dominion over the Prime Material Plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And as far as we know, this other group did not have the help of gods.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. As far as we know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far as we know, unless they went to all of the other gods we have not met.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like we can't look in on anyone that we need to really quickly. I'm feeling the urge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know who it could be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might want to check and see if Allura, Gilmore, Kima, all our buddies are okay. Kash, Zahra.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My question is, does it matter, at the moment?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course it matters, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it? Does it just make us panic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least we'd know if he raised them up like he said he did, if we'll be fighting undead Gilmore and undead Allura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, point made. Point very well made. Let's start with--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a few scrys that I want to do, anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we scry through this dimension?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. I've got to pop out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shouldn't you rest first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, finish this first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you need?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just wondering if I do any type of large magic, if it'll alert him. Hey, what happened to that skull that we got in Brimscythe's basement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the gem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gem in the eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Funny you should ask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember, we thought it might be connected?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It had a gem in one eye, if I recall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, a green emerald gem in one socket, you dicks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura has it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We gave it to Allura.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura has it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's in Percy's workshop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, and Allura came down and saw it-- no, I gave it to Allura.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if it's spying on everything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, Grog. I gave you your deck of cards back! The skull was very dangerous, and at the time it seemed like the right thing to do. I'm sorry. I'm sorry! Look, we just went and got a bunch of beans for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, buddy, we might be dead in a week, you don't want to hold on to that kind of shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may be going to get the skull back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, yeah, we could get the skull back because I was just going through my notes, my old diary, of everything that we've been through--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It literally has a leaf on it, oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have four diaries of everything we've been through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've read them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh. What kind of dumb character keeps a diary?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It said evil skull in Brimscythe's-- 1/21. We found an evil skull in Brimscythe's house. It may be connected to Craven Edge. And I put stars next to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you put stars next to it because it was important or did you just put stars next to it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, that's just what I wrote down a year and a half ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It talked to me and it was like, "If you free me, I'll give you a wish."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The skull?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Why do you think I was trying to break that shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't believe if you'd freed it you would've gotten a wish, I think you would've fought something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know for sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then what are we talking about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find out what's going on with the skull.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we are in final days, here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's give ourselves--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to try and take 48 hours to get as much done as humanly possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you need to maybe open up the plane to the Dread Emperor and see about the Craven Edge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gods must be crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Part two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's low priority.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that's the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if that weapon is super good against Vecna?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just because it's a sword?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, wait, did she say we needed the sword? Also, I think the knight guy that you fought that was super awful was the bloody--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Kas is destroyed. He turned to ash. He fought Vecna and was turned to ash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the knight have a sword?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did. A giant blade that emitted shadow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe that was the sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But wasn't he brought back? Kas the Bloody-Handed, right? Oh wait, he fought--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He fought against Vecna! They destroyed each other. It's the reason Vecna was destroyed to begin with.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But maybe he brought Kas back and that was the Death Knight we fought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The world is full of mysteries.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of which is whether or not our friends are alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to step outside and scry on Allura first!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm going to-- nothing, I'm just going to stand and walk out front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. You're scrying first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you step out into the center of the structure--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Please please please please please...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Is anybody around? Nothing's weird and out of the ordinary?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the Raven's Crest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Just want to make sure. People just punk'd us at Sprigg's cabin!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're inside a church.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doesn't mean assassins can't get inside a church.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go, just scry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura puts her face in her hands for a second rubs her temples, She looks tired. Kima leaves the room, and Allura is left there to think for a second, looks out the window of her tower, then goes back to her writing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was she covered with blood?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, she's fine. She's safe in Emon. So is Kima. They're both safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Skull was next on the list?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Allura has the skull. Do we have any way to talk to her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Should I do Gilmore next? Is that necessary?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you scry on the object? No...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can scry on an object, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An object or a person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I do the skull?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a safe assumption that skull is with her? She's pretty fucking badass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean it might just be a lich phylactery or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who else would have gone into battle against Vecna?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if it is a lich phylactery, that would be something we would smash to bits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could've been Kash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could've been Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who? Oh that fancy fellow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, can you scry on Tary? What if he came searching for us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Tary was still in--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just pick a city. Let's just keep looking at people in various cities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary... we would feel it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth just spit out an idea. If that skull, which looked like his fucking head. We've dealt with a lich before. If it has even a chance of being a vessel for his life force, even a chance, wouldn't we want to not use it, but destroy it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will impart the information that you did discover that the skull was the skull of a githyanki.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that was from 300 hours ago! I misspoke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're a type of people, a race of people that traverse the Astral Sea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it has one eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it has two eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Emerald in one eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, well, the skull shape was alien and was elongated, almost elven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was hundreds of hours ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wanted to save you circularly arguing about something without some information.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we'll still circularly argue about something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure you will!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, this clusterfuck's not over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a half-hour of fuckery right here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little bit of hemming, a little bit of hawing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait a minute. Aren't we forgetting about one undead thing? Didn't we want to go back and talk to Delilah's body?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, we're going to have that conversation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she in your bag?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She might be in the Colding. Let's get into the mansion and talk to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go in the mansion first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we not in the mansion right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We stepped out for a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I never left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The door's open. We're talking through the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, real quick, I still also want to scry on the Shorecomb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to set her up so that she's nice and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys get her set up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a chair and we're going to bind her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) You guys pull the corpse of Delilah Briarwood out of the bag. It hasn't been that long. The body's stiff. A lot of the head is missing. Rigor mortis has definitely caused the body to tighten up a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Undead gas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is, (uncomfortable noise) "Okay..."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're right behind you; it's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a good cause, Pickle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do we have our questions? Do we know what we're going to ask?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many do we get, five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five questions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three? Five?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to double check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was Craven Edge the sword?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sword of Kas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could ask about Vecna and her buddy that banished Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Shadow Knight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm writing them down in my mind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What he has done to prepare for the inevitable attempts to re-bind him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have any weaknesses? Is that too broad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she have to answer? Do they have to answer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she might not care, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, we've got a few things we can threaten her with. We can attempt to have her consecrated and buried in the Raven Queen's temple so that nothing will ever bring her back again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One more question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, in theory, I think it's possible that I could just send her to hell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to ask where he is? Where he was going? What his plan is after ascending?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, buddy. You are a married man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where he is or where he's planning to attack first or what his display of power is going to be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh sure, because he has to do a display to get followers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we have sword of Kas, bloody knight, what he's trying to do to prevent his binding, weakness/fears, and display of power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless the knight was Sylas. I don't know, I guess we'll find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You good with those five?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I feel pretty good. I like this plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's no spirit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. She's already been brought back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's no soul to grasp. Either the soul is beyond reach or she's not dead."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many times are we going to have to fight this bitch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How? We have her body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's a necromancer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a priest of Ioun. I don't know about the undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he got holes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My brother, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My son.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even as a source of information, a source of vengeance, she is a constant disappointment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I scry on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have another spell slot to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have three 5th-level spells plus my Scrying Eye that I haven't used yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you'd like to, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And be sneaky about it, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, do we have to do it outside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to be on the same plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like what you see?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate him so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, you pull out of the scrying experience and you look around, your friends are staring at you. You guys didn't hear anything, but once again you hear in your ear once more, "Don't "worry, all shall be revealed soon enough."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sleep well, young Keyleth."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did you look? What did you see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no safe place to hide. He can see us everywhere. We should go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: LAURA
