lines.text: You're outside of the mansion. Come in the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if he comes here? What if he comes here to try and find us and he kills all of these people? What if we led him here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knows. We'll lead him anywhere, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Delilah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's alive. She's at Thar Amphala, both eyes this time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to ask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She'll remove it soon enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She said, "It's almost time; it's happening soon." Whatever he's doing it's happening soon and then he spoke to me in my vision. He said my name. He knows... She's alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many times?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As many as it takes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Plane Shift us from here, from the mansion?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can Plane Shift from the mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, we need to rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll have to do it in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can burn my 9th-level spell and get us there right now, but we'll lose the mansion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need the mansion to sleep. We can't sleep anywhere without the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can sleep and I can Plane Shift us when we wake up from this mansion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that a 9th-level spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seventh. We could Transport via Plants. And I found a tree to get us to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shorecomb.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Shorebottom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As awful as it is, we need to sleep, if we can't fight him in the morning or anytime.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have to prepare. The tunnels have toxic fumes and all sorts of stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to breathe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to figure out a way to survive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deal with poisoned air and breathing underwater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, like you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Visit the Water Ashari for those--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Things. Yeah, that's smart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could also cast Water Breathing on eight of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will that save us from the poison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Water Breathing gets you under the water, but you still have poison in the air once you get to the tubes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but do the things from the Water Ashari, would those help with poison as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those help you filter water into air. Poison is a different thing.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Immune to poison. We have two chalices.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From the palace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chalice from the palace?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the brew that's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That could work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to go so many places.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be all right. We have one advantage that they do not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Opposable thumbs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That too. Only one of us is underestimating the other. We can do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're fine. We know we have to be careful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The plan then is sleep and then we go to Shorecomb. And then we go under this volcano to the anvil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we borrowing some water breathing equipment before we go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do that to us. I can cast Water Breathing on all of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heroes' Feast, Water Breathing, platinum, and then you're going to hit something with a hammer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bank in the morning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bank in the morning. Then off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then through a tree, and then there.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous. Shall we rest up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more thing before we go to sleep. Not to draw this out any longer. I'm going to, right before bed, attempt to turn into, using my True Polymorph, one of those fun, winged, tall creatures we met at Pelor's place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An angel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turn who into that? Yourself? Yeah, the planetar. You can definitely do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With True Polymorph?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've seen it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen it, but I don't know it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing this privately or in front of everybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In your room, you suddenly grow to the size of an 11- to 12-foot, muscular humanoid. Bald head, deep blue skin, with beautiful white angel wings that unfurl for 24 foot, tip to tip length, you feel holy power surge through your body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, just wanted to make sure that would work. Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you do anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I just stand there naked looking at myself. Anything else that happens in that room, you don't want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the winged Dr. Manhattan stands there in his room, staring at his own Manhattan junk--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So this is what it sounds like when doves cry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (speaking) The wings curl in. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was the most home-game moment we've ever had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And on that note, we're going to close tonight's episode. (laughs) All right, guys, thanks again for playing, thank you guys for watching. Thank you once again Darin De Paul for coming and guesting, closing Sprigg's story in an interesting way. I wasn't sure how he was going to do that. We'll see you guys next week. Be safe, love each other, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) Hallelujah! [music]
